color.gradient: radial-gradient(at 69% 89%, hsla(231,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 21% 11%, hsla(329,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 17% 52%, hsla(175,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 14% 91%, hsla(34,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 89% 1%, hsla(249,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 6% 22%, hsla(150,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 73% 4%, hsla(111,100%,79%,1) 0px, transparent 50%);
